Skin.name: V8 but by FRUiT
Skin.author: FRUiT
Skin.comment: VER 0.8.2 - v8 skin engine at its best !

Skin:
(c)2014 - Atomix Productions
native raw default day plum lime strawberry superman electro dark tangerine kitty haze flower ocean Virtual Mild
Helvetica
1372
LOGO
Copyright Atomix Productions
Virtual DJ `get_license` `get_version` build `get_build`
Skin version 0.8.2 designed by FRUiT
Click this logo to access common VirtualDJ settings
Battery : `get_battery`
GENERAL MENU
Configure Virtual DJ global layout
Did you know ? The Virtual DJ logo is a clickable menu
Battery : `get_battery`
<item text="Warning (<15%)" action="toggle '@$v8bf_ac_warn'" check="var '@$v8bf_ac_warn' 0"/>
LAYOUT
Set here the number of decks and/or the general Virtual DJ appearance
WAVEVIEW
Select waveform layout
FORM
Select waveform layout
FORM
Select waveform layout
MIXER SETTINGS
Choose the mixer's layout and options
TIP: In every layout you can change left and right decks by rightclicking the select buttons in the vaveform window
DECK SETTINGS
Choose the deck's layout and options
AUTOMIX DECK SETTINGS
Choose the automix deck's layout and options
CONTROLLER MODE SETTINGS
Choose the controller mode deck's layout and options
MINIDECKS SETTINGS
Choose the deck's layout and options
LOOP SELECT
Select which loop slot to control
CROSSFADER SETTINGS
PER DECK SETTINGS
Choose the center-panel's layout and options
ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action
ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action ACTIVATE EFFECT
Rightclick for temporary action
EFFECT SELECT
Rightclick to show effect's gui in browser
Assign this deck to left side Assign this deck to left side Assign this deck to left side Assign this deck to left side
PITCH
Click to activate pitch_lock
Rightclick to sync this deck
LEVEL
ADJUST BEAT GRID
Leftclick to slightly move the grid backward
Rightclick to move downbeat
ADJUST BEAT GRID
Leftclick to slightly move the grid forward
Rightclick to move downbeat
CPU
System use (all software running right now)
SETTINGS
Change configurations for VirtualDJ MINIMIZE
Minimize the software MAXIMIZE
Toggle between large view, full screen view CLOSE
Close VirtualDJ
RECORD LEVEL
KEY
Click here to toggle various key infos
KEY
Click here to toggle various key infos
KEY LOCK
Lock the current key and let the pitch slider move without modifying the key anymore
Rightclick to reset the key
MATCH KEY
Set the key to match the opposite deck
KEY UP
Moves the song's key one semitone up
KEY DOWN
Moves the song's key one semitone down
PER DECK CENTER MENU
Switch between several per deck layouts
DECK BRAKE
Toggle a vinyl brake style mode
DECK BRAKE
Toggle a vinyl brake style mode
CLEAR
Reset several settings at once
CLEAR
Reset several settings at once
PITCH QUALITY
0: lowest
1: medium
2: best
BEATLOCK BEATLOCK
SMART SCRATCH
Cut sound while scratching backwards SMART SCRATCH
Cut sound while scratching backwards
SMART SCRATCH DECK 1
Cut sound while scratching backwards SMART SCRATCH DECK 2
Cut sound while scratching backwards SMART SCRATCH DECK 3
Cut sound while scratching backwards SMART SCRATCH DECK 4
Cut sound while scratching backwards
MASTER MENU
Switch between several master tabs

%Pfromcue1' : var '@$v8bf_cue' 1 ? get_text '1
%Bfromcue1' : var '@$v8bf_cue' 2 ? get_text '1
%Pcue1' : var '@$v8bf_cue' 3 ? get_text '1
%Pnamecue1' : get_text '1'"
rightclick="file_info `get_automix_song 'filename'`"
icon x="297" y="1393" height="26" dx="" dy="0"
